title: I Want Cosmetics in New Colors!
detail_text: <:th_ch0108/>Wow! Eli, any color looks good on you~! Try this lipstick on too! ùÖ†<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>No, I‚Äôm fine. We came here to pick something out for you today, right?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>But it‚Äôs so fun to play around with you, Eli~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>Play around, huh... Fine! I‚Äôll play around with you too. This color looks like it‚Äôd suit you. Here, try it on.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>Hmm... How does it look?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>Yeah, it suits you!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>Eli, you should try this, this, and this!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>I told you I‚Äôm fine...<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>Bravo! This color is the best!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>Actually, I think I really like this color...!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
